item.title: Configure Pi-Hole DNS + Cloudflare DNS over HTTPS (DoH) on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: Block ads, trackers, and malware from any local device without having to use an ad-blocker; while securing your DNS traffic at the same time - sounds good! First, what is Pi-Hole? According to Jacob Salmela, the creator of Pi-Hole: Pi-hole is a network-wide ad blocker. Instead of installing adblockers on every device and every browser, you can install Pi-hole once on your network, and it will protect all of your devices.
